ygData.subject: RE: Rivervale to Qeynos?
ygData.msgSnippet: If your computer is slowing down greatly or even freezing when there is a lot of magic in the air then you might want to try turning off particle density. You
ygData.messageBody:
If your computer is slowing down greatly or even freezing when there is a
lot of magic in the air then you might want to try turning off particle
density. You won't see any spell effects but at least your computer won't be
ground into the dirt. It will take a few minutes to get used to.
Although don't let that stop you from geting a new system. =)

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)


8)-----Original Message-----

8)I know. I have chars on other servers that are "old enough"
8)to hunt in BB but
8)with everyone else in there and all the magic casting ... I
8)end up lagging
8)sooooooooooooo much. My screen will even freeze at times and
8)I have no clue
8)what is happening (like if I'm dead). I finally gave up
8)hunting there and
8)moved on to the Karanas. I'm not making any cash at all, but
8)at least I can
8)actually play the game.
